main.title: Professional Experience
main.description: My journey through various roles in machine learning and software development

experiences.description: Lead machine learning initiatives for enterprise clients, focusing on predictive analytics and automated decision systems. Built and deployed ML pipelines serving millions of users daily.
responsibilities: Designed and implemented ML infrastructure serving 10M+ daily requests
Reduced model inference latency by 60% through optimization techniques
Led a team of 5 engineers in developing real-time recommendation systems
Established MLOps practices reducing deployment time from weeks to hours

experiences.description: Developed machine learning models for customer behavior analysis and fraud detection. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate ML solutions into production systems.
responsibilities: Built fraud detection system reducing false positives by 40%
Implemented A/B testing framework for ML model evaluation
Created data pipeline processing 1TB+ daily transaction data
Improved customer segmentation accuracy by 35% using ensemble methods

experiences.description: Analyzed large datasets to derive business insights and built predictive models for customer acquisition and retention. Worked closely with product teams to implement data-driven features.
responsibilities: Developed customer lifetime value prediction model improving retention by 25%
Created automated reporting system saving 20 hours/week of manual work
Built recommendation engine increasing user engagement by 30%
Established data governance practices and documentation standards
